name: Dotinum
description:
We are a software house and creative agency from Wroclaw, Poland. Since 2002, we provide quality IT services for both domestic and international clients.
Well-qualified developers
We are a team of skilled and experienced developers and graphic designers who put their expertise together in order to come up with unique solutions for our clients.
Knowledge of international business
Wondering whether an outsourcing partner will understand your overseas market? Thanks to our vast international experience we don't only create the software you want, but the one that delivers great business results where you are.
Devoted to your business
You care about your business? We do too! Whatever we create, we always have your best interest in mind. We are devoted to creating custom solutions that will fit YOUR needs and that will make running your business easier. 
READ MORE...
